FuncDef: The display service-ha global-information preempt-time command displays global configurations of the value-added service management (VSM) high availability (HA) module.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the preempt time of the VSM HA module.
-

ExtraInfo: To view global configurations of the VSM HA module, such as the delayed backup time, run the display service-ha global-information command.
